creditline: The Walter C. and Mary C. Briggs Trust Fund
description: round stained glass panel depicting the Adoration of the Magi, with Mary seated at one side holding baby Jesus on her lap; three men holding gold containers at other side; central standing man gestures up to the Star of Bethlehem; angel above Mary's head; floral border
object_name: Stained glass roundel, from a set of five
title: The Adoration of the Maji
